name: Death Typer
description:
Death Typer is your regular zombie shooter... but with a huge scary and exciting twist! Shooting does not happen by repeatedly pressing the left mouse button, but by entering a given text.

Sounds easy? HA! It's not that easy if you consider that your good old ten-finger-typewriter-typing-system™ is useless, as you need one of your two hands to aim with the mouse >:D
